bio:
An experienced photographer with over 20 years of photography and editing experience, Brian Walski founded Colorado Visions in 2005.  As a freelance commercial photographer and former staff photographer for the Los Angeles Times, Boston Herald, Albuquerque Journal and numerous smaller newspapers, Brian has photographed a wide range of subjects always striving for the best possible pictures.  During that time he has developed an eye for light and style in a wide range of photographic applications with a quality emphasis on corporate, editorial, event, product, travel and wedding photography.  He takes personal pride in the workmanship within all aspects of the photographic process, from major projects to the quality control of the finest details.  Brian strives to shoot pictures that push the creative boundary but also communicate in simple terms. 


Colorado Visions offers a fresh, creative approach to showcase events and projects with the utmost care to achieve the highest quality ima

bio: I've used Java, PHP and MySQL in various capacities to deliver a highly-customized solution to my clients.  What I lack in visual design, I make up for in application design, such that, the applications are versatile for updates / enhancements and the like.  I focus on not only the base requirements from the client, but also the potential requirements and enhancements that the client could benefit from.

I'm currently freelancing on the side.  I have a regular 9-5 during the day, but can respond to e-mail.  Eventually, I hope to make the switch to freelancing full-time, but do not have the client base to do so yet.

I work with Guru on a part-time basis.  Much of my work is done after normal business hours, as I owe my attention to my full-time job during business hours.  This doesn't prevent me from delivering on deadline though.  I'm a hard worker, and I won't bite off more than I can chew.

Payment terms are typically 50% upfront and the rest upon deliverables.  If it's a sizable deliverable, the upfront will drop with the milestone payments taking it's place.

I'm all about communication.  If I think I have something wrong or mistaken, I'll communicate that to you to make sure you get the product you envisioned.

abstrac: I bring the best in you and your business forward for your success in marketing and sales and outshine your competition
bio: My experience in professional life working at a multinational company (IBM) for several years ,holding different positions at several departments including sales ,marketing, training gave me the privilege of gaining different perspectives on how a company functions. Being part of a reorganization and motivation team at IBM ,I enjoyed finding out how employees are inspired and stay committed and how management can help achieve the goal to retain good talent. This was the first glimpse of my passion in organizational psychology and behavior. I developed a special interest in finding out how and why some companies succeed while others fail. I continue reading  several business books , magazines, and get training on many management, coaching, and leadership subjects.  I also have experience working at local companies as a Marketing Manager and as a Sales and Marketing manager In San Diego, CA. My biggest values are integrity, compassion, sharing our gifts with the world and helping others.
We can always discuss the working terms.

abstrac: Equity Research, Strategy and competitor benchmarking research
bio: I am working for one of the leading Institutional Broking firm as Equity Research Analyst covering Aviation, Healthcare, Paints, T&T and NBFI sectors along with handling Quantitative team. Earlier, I was with one of global Investment Bank, as an Analyst in IB Ops division where I was responsible for preparing and managing Story board & Business Case for financial planning and budgeting for IB Ops Strategy team. I was also certified with Six Sigma Yellow Belt. I have started my professional career as Market Research Executive in July 2005 and then joined leading derivative research & data company as Research Analyst in September 2005 in company's debt obligation research process. In a year time, I got the position of Sr. Research Analyst and headed the Bonds & CDS research team. I was responsible for the managing a team of 5 members and coordinating the work between team members and the clients along with the QC of team reports.

abstrac: E-Assist Virtual Administrative Support- An SBO's answer to administrative help!
bio:
E-Assist Virtual Administrative Support was created to provide the highest level of administrative support to entrepreneurs so that they can focus on growing and running their business, not letting their business run them.

With a reputable career in administrative and customer support roles, I possess the qualifications to handle circumstances that require attention to detail, excellent verbal and written communication, and creative problem solving ability. I am knowledgeable in many aspects of office management and confident that I can help you obtain the freedom you desire to dedicate more time to your business.

I am not here to get rich off of you, but to partner with you. I will be there during the good times and the bad, the ups and the downs. And as we work together and your business begins to flourish, I will be right by your side for the celebration!

Payment Method: SafePay

Are You Available At Anytime?   I would prefer not to be 'on call', but during our strategic planning meeting, we will discuss your support needs and determine how often my assistance is required for your specific situation.

What method of communication do you utilize most?   I can be reached via email or phone.
